mapper.select: select no mateNo, carNo, to_char(startDate, 'yyyy.mm.dd day') startDate, people, to_char(endDate, 'yyyy.mm.dd day') endDate, round(endDate - startDate, 0) allDay, point, comments from spotmate where no = #{no}
select u.id, u.name, c.carName, c.carPicture, c.carName, c.carNo, c.introduce, s.comments from users u, car c, spotmate s where u.no = c.userNo and c.no = s.carNo and s.type = 'mate' and s.no = #{no}

select p.mateNo, p.day, p.wayNo, p.sepplace, p.time, p.place, p.lat, p.lng, to_char(s.startDate, 'yyyy.mm.dd day') startDate, to_char(s.endDate, 'yyyy.mm.dd day') endDate from place p, spotmate s where s.no = p.mateNo and p.mateNo = #{no}
select no detailOptNo, name from detailOpt
select d.no mateOptionNo, d.name optionName from spotDetail s, detailOpt d where s.detailNo = d.no and s.mateNo = #{no}

select r.id, star, content from (select mateNo, driverNo, no from reservation) d, ( select driverNo from reservation where mateNo = #{no} ) i, (select star, content, resvno from userReview ) s, (select id, r.no, r.mateNo from users u, reservation r where u.no = r.userNo) r where d.driverNo = i.driverNo and d.no = s.resvno and r.no = s.resvno

select round(avg(star),1) avgStar from users u, car c, reservation r, userReview w, spotmate sm where u.no = c.userNo and c.no = sm.carNo and sm.no = r.mateNo and u.no = r.driverNo and r.no = w.resvNo and u.no = (select ca.userNo from spotMate sm, car ca where sm.carNo = ca.no and sm.no = 1)
mapper.insert:
select driverNo from reservation where mateNo = #{spotMateNo} group by driverNo
insert into reservation values (seq_reservation_no.nextval, #{spotMateNo}, #{userNo}, #{driverNo}, sysdate, #{point}, 'open', #{people}, '', '')
